caption.p: RDT reaction to CHIKV ECSA-genotype strains CP10 and SL11131 and Asian-genotype strains ARUBA-15801125 and ARUBA-15800567. The x-axis denotes viral titers in plaque forming units (PFU) per mL. Blue circles and red diamonds indicate version-A and -O RDT measurements, respectively. The y-axis indicates the intensity of the test line (milli-absorbance units; mAbs)
